original_text: For a will takes effect only at death, since it is not in force as long as the one who made it is alive.
korean_text: 유언은 그 사람이 죽은 후에야 유효한즉 유언한 자가 살아 있는 동안에는 효력이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: For a will takes effect only at death,
since it is not in force as long as the one who made it is alive.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 유언을 만든 사람이 살아있는 동안에는 효력이 없기 때문입니다.
